name: Overclocked (itch) (Juice Machine Games)
description:
Take the role as the managers assistant and keep the unhappy employees from quitting their job at the company. Do this by giving compliments, prepare coffee-machines and cleaning their offices to make them happy.

Controls:
WASD - To move
1, 2, or 3 - Select your supplies, either coffe, doughnuts or music speaker

Mechanics:
Walk up to a drawer in the red corridor and select your supplies to make your emplyees happy! (See screenshots for visual presentation

  • Doughnut box: Makes employees happy with glazed doughnuts! Needs to be refilled from the kitchen when empty. Emplyees only take one per box.
  • Coffee Machine: Serves the employees delicious coffee in bursts.
  • Music speaker: Fills the area with smooth lo-fi beats to relax and work to.

You can also give a raise to an employee if needed!

Made for Global Game Jam 2022!
